graphql.query:
query Site($siteKey: String!) {
  site(siteKey: $siteKey) {
    hasValidProductionMeter
    hasWifi
    isEnabledInNightvision
    isLegacyPvs
    hasPanelsCheck
    isNightvisionEnabled
    isPanelsEnabledInNightvision
    isSiteNightvisionEnabled
    latitude
    originalAssignmentEffectiveTimestamp
    parties {
      partyId
      relation
      displayName
      partyType
      isContract
      phone
      email
      preferredContactMethod
    }
    postalCode
    siteName
    siteType
    state
    address1
    dealers {
      partyId
      displayName
      email
      phone
    }
    hasMI
    hasPanelLayout
    hasLivedata
  }}
